Title: 167: Why All Companies Need a Data Science Culture
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Director of Data Science at Data Society, Nisha Iyer. You will hear how members of an organization or company benefit more when they are adept with data, learn how attending hands-on trainings could magnify your data science learning experience, and learn how communication and hospitality skills are important and helpful in your data science career.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/167
